verses.verse: The word<WH1697> that came to Jeremiah<WH3414> from the Lord<WH3068>, saying<WH559>,

Stand<WH5975> in the gate<WH8179> of the Lord<WH3068>'s house<WH1004>, and proclaim<WH7121> there this word<WH1697>, and say<WH559>, Hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068>, all you of Judah<WH3063>, that enter in<WH935> at these gates<WH8179> to worship<WH7812> the Lord<WH3068>.

Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, Mend<WH3190> your ways<WH1870> and your doings<WH4611>, and I will cause you to live<WH7931> in this place<WH4725>.

For if you thoroughly<WH3190> mend<WH3190> your ways<WH1870> and your doings<WH4611>; if you thoroughly<WH6213> execute<WH6213> judgment<WH4941> between a man<WH376> and his neighbor<WH7453>;

If you oppress<WH6231> not the stranger<WH1616>, the fatherless<WH3490>, and the widow<WH490>, and shed<WH8210> not innocent<WH5355> blood<WH1818> in this place<WH4725>, neither walk<WH3212> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430> to your hurt<WH7451>:
Then will I cause you to live<WH7931> in this place<WH4725>, in the land<WH776> that I gave<WH5414> to your fathers<WH1>, for<WH5704> ever<WH5769> and ever<WH5769>.
Behold<WH982>, you trust in lying<WH8267> words<WH1697>, that cannot profit<WH3276>.

Will you steal<WH1589>, murder<WH7523>, and commit adultery<WH5003>, and swear<WH7650> falsely<WH8267>, and burn incense<WH6999> unto Baal<WH1168>, and walk<WH1980> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430> whom you know not<WH3045>;

And come<WH935> and stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> me in this house<WH1004>, which is called<WH7121> by my name<WH8034>, and say<WH559>, We are delivered<WH5337> to do<WH6213> all these abominations<WH8441>?
Is this house<WH1004>, which is called<WH7121> by my name<WH8034>, become a den<WH4631> of robbers<WH6530> in your eyes<WH5869>? Behold<WH7200>, even I have seen it<WH5002>, says the Lord<WH3068>.

But go<WH3212> you now unto my place<WH4725> which was in Shiloh<WH7887>, where I set<WH7931> my name<WH8034> at the first<WH7223>, and see<WH7200> what I did<WH6213> to it for<WH6440> the wickedness<WH7451> of my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>.

And now<WH6213>, because you have done all these works<WH4639>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>, and I spoke<WH1696> unto you<WH7925>, rising up early and speaking<WH1696>, but you heard<WH8085> not<WH7121>; and I called you<WH6030>, but you answered not;

Therefore will I do<WH6213> unto this house<WH1004>, which is called<WH7121> by my name<WH8034>, where you trust<WH982>, and unto the place<WH4725> which I gave<WH5414> to you and to your fathers<WH1>, as I have done<WH6213> to Shiloh<WH7887>.
And I will cast you out<WH7993> of my sight<WH6440>, as I have cast out<WH7993> all your brothers<WH251>, even the whole seed<WH2233> of Ephraim<WH669>.

Therefore pray<WH6419> not you for this people<WH5971>, neither lift up<WH5375> cry<WH7440> nor prayer<WH8605> for them<WH1157>, neither make intercession<WH6293> to me<WH8085>: for I will not hear you.
See<WH7200> you not what they do<WH6213> in the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063> and in the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem<WH3389>?

The sons<WH1121> gather<WH3950> wood<WH6086>, and the fathers<WH1> kindle<WH1197> the fire<WH784>, and the women<WH802> knead<WH3888> their dough<WH1217>, to make<WH6213> cakes<WH3561> to the queen<WH4446> of heaven<WH8064>, and to pour out<WH5258> drink offerings<WH5262> unto other<WH312> gods<WH430>, that they may provoke me to anger<WH3707>.
Do they provoke me to anger<WH3707>? says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>: do they not provoke themselves to the confusion<WH1322> of their own faces<WH6440>?

Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; Behold<WH639>, my anger and my fury<WH2534> shall be poured out<WH5413> upon this place<WH4725>, upon man<WH120>, and upon animal<WH929>, and upon the trees<WH6086> of the field<WH7704>, and upon the fruit<WH6529> of the ground<WH127>; and it shall burn<WH1197>, and shall not be quenched<WH3518>.
Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>; Put<WH5595> your burnt offerings<WH5930> unto your sacrifices<WH2077>, and eat<WH398> flesh<WH1320>.

For I spoke<WH1696> not unto your fathers<WH1>, nor commanded<WH6680> them in the day<WH3117> that I brought them out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, concerning<WH1697> burnt offerings<WH5930> or sacrifices<WH2077>:

But this thing<WH1697> commanded<WH6680> I them<WH559>, saying, Obey<WH8085> my voice<WH6963>, and I will be your God<WH430>, and you shall be my people<WH5971>: and walk<WH1980> you in all the ways<WH1870> that I have commanded<WH6680> you<WH3190>, that it may be well unto you.

But they listened<WH8085> not<WH5186>, nor inclined their ear<WH241>, but walked<WH3212> in the counsels<WH4156> and in the imagination<WH8307> of their evil<WH7451> heart<WH3820>, and went backward<WH268>, and not forward<WH6440>.

Since the day<WH3117> that your fathers<WH1> came forth out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> unto this day<WH3117> I have even sent<WH7971> unto you all my servants<WH5650> the prophets<WH5030>, daily<WH3117> rising up early<WH7925> and sending them<WH7971>:
Yet they listened<WH8085> not unto me<WH5186>, nor inclined their ear<WH241>, but hardened<WH7185> their neck<WH6203>: they did worse<WH7489> than their fathers<WH1>.
Therefore you shall speak<WH1696> all these words<WH1697> unto them<WH8085>; but they will not listen to you<WH7121>: you shall also call unto them<WH6030>; but they will not answer you.

But you shall say<WH559> unto them<WH1471>, This is a nation that obeys<WH8085> not the voice<WH6963> of the Lord<WH3068> their God<WH430>, nor receives<WH3947> correction<WH4148>: truth<WH530> is perished<WH6>, and is cut off<WH3772> from their mouth<WH6310>.

Cut off<WH1494> your hair<WH5145>, O Jerusalem<WH7993>, and cast it away, and take up<WH5375> a lamentation<WH7015> on high places<WH8205>; for the Lord<WH3068> has rejected<WH3988> and forsaken<WH5203> the generation<WH1755> of his wrath<WH5678>.

For the sons<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> have done<WH6213> evil<WH7451> in my sight<WH5869>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>: they have set<WH7760> their abominations<WH8251> in the house<WH1004> which is called<WH7121> by my name<WH8034>, to pollute it<WH2930>.

And they have built<WH1129> the high places<WH1116> of Tophet<WH8612>, which is in the valley<WH1516> of the son<WH1121> of Hinnom<WH2011>, to burn<WH8313> their sons<WH1121> and their daughters<WH1323> in the fire<WH784>; which I commanded<WH6680> them not<WH5927>, neither came it into my heart<WH3820>.

Therefore<WH3117>, behold, the days come<WH935>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>, that it shall no more be called<WH559> Tophet<WH8612>, nor the valley<WH1516> of the son<WH1121> of Hinnom<WH2011>, but the valley<WH1516> of slaughter<WH2028>: for they shall bury<WH6912> in Tophet<WH8612>, until there be no<WH369> place<WH4725>.

And the carcasses<WH5038> of this people<WH5971> shall be food<WH3978> for the birds<WH5775> of the heaven<WH8064>, and for the animals<WH929> of the earth<WH776>; and none shall frighten them away<WH2729>.

Then will I cause to cease<WH7673> from the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063>, and from the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, the voice<WH6963> of mirth<WH8342>, and the voice<WH6963> of gladness<WH8057>, the voice<WH6963> of the bridegroom<WH2860>, and the voice<WH6963> of the bride<WH3618>: for the land<WH776> shall be desolate<WH2723>.
